installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y jq curl wget grep

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ $MAVEN_VERSION == "latest" ]
then
  echo -e "Downloading latest release from GitHub..."

  curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/GlowstoneMC/Glowstone/releases/latest \
  | grep "browser_download_url.*jar" \
  | cut -d : -f 2,3 \
  | tr -d \" \
  | wget -O ${SERVER_JARFILE} -qi -
else 
  echo -e "Downloading release ${MAVEN_VERSION} from Maven Repository..."
  
  wget -O ${SERVER_JARFILE} "https://repo.glowstone.net/service/rest/v1/search/assets/download?group=net.glowstone&name=glowstone&sort=version&repository=snapshots&maven.baseVersion=${MAVEN_VERSION}&direction=desc&maven.classifier="
fi

echo -e "Generating configuration..."
java -jar ${SERVER_JARFILE} --generate-config

echo -e "Install Complete"
